en.label: Calendar of Axiem (The Azure Realms)
en.description: The standard calendar of Axiem, featuring twelve 32-day months. Used throughout the Azure Realms setting in TTRPG campaigns.

months.name: Carmad
months.description: The first month of the year, marking the beginning of spring. Named for the renewal of life and the blooming of flowers.

months.name: Gilmad
months.description: The second month of spring, second of the year, known for its vibrant growth and the flourishing of nature. Named for the golden hues of blooming flowers.

months.name: Optimad
months.description: The third month of spring, third of the year, a time of optimism and new beginnings. Named for the optimism that comes with the season's growth.

months.name: Pylux
months.description: The first month of summer, forth of the year, characterized by warmth and long days. Named for the bright light of the sun during this season.

months.name: Tegalux
months.description: The second month of summer, fifth of the year, known for its lush landscapes and vibrant life. Named for the teeming life that flourishes in the summer sun.

months.name: Kedlux
months.description: The third month of summer, sixth of the year, a time of abundance and harvest. Named for the kedl flowers that bloom during this season.

months.name: Yidfol
months.description: The first month of fall, seventh of the year, marking the transition from summer to autumn. Named for the yidfol trees that shed their leaves during this time.

months.name: Solfol
months.description: The second month of fall, eighth of the year, known for its golden hues and the harvest season. Named for the solfol trees that bear fruit during this time.

months.name: Layfol
months.description: The third month of fall, ninth of the year, a time of reflection and preparation for winter. Named for the layfol trees that prepare for the cold months ahead.

months.name: Breggnum
months.description: The first month of winter, tenth of the year, marking the onset of cold weather and snow. Named for the bregg flowers that bloom in the frost.

months.name: Frignum
months.description: The second month of winter, eleventh of the year, known for its harsh conditions and long nights. Named for the frignum trees that endure the cold.

months.name: Ruggnum
months.description: The third month of winter, twelfth of the year, a time of endurance and survival. Named for the ruggnum trees that thrive in the harshest conditions.

weekdays.name: Phereus
weekdays.description: First day of the week, often used for planning and new endeavors, named after the goddess Phantom

weekdays.name: Urrat
weekdays.description: Second day of the week, a time for reflection and rest, named after the goddess Urra

weekdays.name: Xeus
weekdays.description: Third day of the week, a day of action and progress, named after the goddess Xutara

weekdays.name: Lurat
weekdays.description: Fourth day of the week, a time for peace, named after the god Lucifer

weekdays.name: Aeus
weekdays.description: Fifth day of the week, a day for learning and knowledge, named after the god Aeon

weekdays.name: Sherat
weekdays.description: Sixth day of the week, a day for family and personal time, named after the goddess Sheridan

weekdays.name: Mieus
weekdays.description: Seventh day of the week, a day for creativity and inspiration, named after the god Machiel

weekdays.name: Emat
weekdays.description: Eighth day of the week, a day for rest and rejuvenation, named after the goddess Emroy

en.description: Largest moon, attributed to Emroy the over goddess
Second largest moon attributed to Phantom Blackbird.
Smallest moon yet most light-reflective, named after the goddesses Urra and Xutara, Point of contention with their followers which gods the moon is actually named after. Mananite Moon.

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.description: The harsh cold season in the northern hemisphere.

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.description: The season of renewal as Urra's blessing returns life to the land.

seasons.name: Summer
seasons.description: The bright season of growth and adventure across northern Axiem.

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.description: The harvest season when communities prepare for winter's approach.
